message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this product to you for $14,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay up to $13,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I'm willing to come down a bit, but $13,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,500?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. I would like to propose a price of $13,200 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in the middle for both of us.
